goal.ch: Human resources are important organizational assets (just as capital, raw materials, and energy are important assets).  Recognizing this requires that human resource managers understand how to apply basic principles of decision making to human resource decisions such as selection, turnover, recruitment, compensation, etc.  This seminar will introduce the concepts of costs and benefits and evaluate the effectiveness of HR programs.  The course objectives are to present the principles of managerial decision making as a framework for structuring and making human resource decisions and programs.
